name: Glide the Tomb
description:
A short 3D platformer made for a class with the intent of experimenting - in this case, with the idea of a platformer with a heavy focus on floating mechanics. 

It's playable via a controller (built for a Xbox 360 controller). The player character is moved with the left joystick, the camera with the right joystick, and with the A button can jump. If the A button is held down the player can perform a high jump, and pressing the button again while in the air will cause them to start/stop floating. The Back button closes the game.

If you want to read more about this project or view some of my other projects, please check out my portfolio.
